name: SnowGuy
0:
”Alexa, ask Snow Guy to get a snow report for Breckenridge”
”Alexa, tell Snow Guy to get the pow report for Wolf Creek”
”Alexa, ask Snow Guy what's it look like at Loveland”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snow guy
des: Snow Guy will get you the snow conditions at your favorite Coloradan ski resort. Get information such as new snowfall, base snow, and open/closed status.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
